com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

Class TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.corpus.AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
      • com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedCorpusReader, SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader, TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader, CurrentFileObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader

    public class TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader
extends AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
implements TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader, CurrentFileObserver
    A corpus reader that expects one token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction, via a CorpusLineReader.
    The following placeholders are required:
    CorpusLine.CorpusElement.TOKEN
    These are included surrounded by % signs on both sides, and without the prefix "CorpusElement."
    Example (note that the regex is applied to one line, so no endline is necessary): 
     .+\t%TOKEN%
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Constructor Detail

      • TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader

        public TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader(java.io.Reader reader,
                                   Config config,
                                   TalismaneSession session)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   TalismaneException
        Add attributes as specified in the config to the corpus reader. Recognises the attributes:
        - input-pattern: the pattern to match corpus line elements, see class description.
        - sentence-file: where to read the correctly formatted sentences
        - corpus-lexical-entry-regex: how to read the lexical entries, see RegexLexicalEntryReader
        Parameters:
        config - the local config for this corpus reader (local namespace)
        Throws:
        TalismaneException
        java.io.IOException
